contents.content: UNIT 03 面试礼仪 Interview Etiquette
Lesson 1 着装仪表礼仪 Dressing and Appearance Etiquette
杰克和玛丽在讨论面试中应当如何着装。

contents.title: 杰克：得体的着装仪表会给面试官留下好的印象，因此是非常重要的。
contents.answer: Decent dressing and appearance, which contribute to a good first impression of the interviewer, are surely quite important.

contents.title: 玛丽：这是自然。通常来说，着装要整洁大方，与自己的身份、年龄和阅历相称。
contents.answer: Of course. Generally speaking, dressing should be tidy and neat, and match well with your identity, age, and experience.

contents.title: 杰克：无论穿什么，都应当充分体现自信与朝气。
contents.answer: Whatever you wear, it should perfectly reflect your confi dence and vitality.

contents.content: 着装与仪表是考察你是不是专业人员，以及能否胜任所应聘职位的重要因素。所以，应当充分重视。

contents.title: 玛丽：最好是比较职业的着装。
contents.answer: Professional suits may be the best choice.

contents.title: 杰克：男士应聘时，最好穿西服，显得英俊潇洒。
contents.answer: Gentlemen should wear western-style suits in the interview, which will help you look handsome.

contents.title: 玛丽：女士应穿套装，可选经典风格，或体现自己的风格。淡妆或不化妆都是合适的。
contents.answer: Ladies should wear professional suits, either classical style or free style. It would be appropriate to wear a little or no make-up.

contents.title: 杰克：但是时尚的以及亮闪闪的衣饰不宜出现。
contents.answer: But those fashionable and shiny clothes should be avoided.

contents.title: 玛丽：也不需要穿名牌服装，得体就好。
contents.answer: Name brand is not necessary. Anything decent will be fine.

contents.content: 男士应聘时，一定要特别注意整洁，尤其是头发，长短一定要合适，面试前最好洗一下。另外，男士最好是穿西服，配上硬领衬衫，挺括领带，展现气魄和魅力。西裤装必须要有中折线，除了合身，长度必须盖过脚背。

contents.title: 杰克：要顺利通过面试，就要充分展现出自己最好的一面。
contents.answer: You should present the best of yourself in order to achieve success in the interview.

contents.title: 玛丽：只有着装与周围人相符合，才会感到融洽放松。
contents.answer: Only when you dressing keep in accordance with that of other people around can you feel harmonious and relaxed.

contents.title: 杰克：总的说来，着装仪表很重要，却也不是全部。
contents.answer: In a word, dressing and appearance are indeed important, but it should never be all.

contents.title: 玛丽：换言之，一味注重着装仪表，无疑是舍本逐末。
contents.answer: In other words, too much emphasis on it is undoubtedly to neglect the essentials.

contents.content: 女士应聘多穿套装。一般来讲，需要关注服饰的颜色、款式、花纹三个要素。可以选择经典的风格，也可以自由发挥。但是，短裤、长靴、丝袜这样的时尚元素，以及亮闪闪的装饰不宜出现，过于紧身的和牛仔风格的服饰也应尽量避免。淡妆或不化妆都是合适的，以个人习惯为准。长发最好扎起来，最常见的是扎马尾。会盘发的话可以把长发盘起来。染发和烫发已经为人们认可，若非是十分夸张的颜色或发式，就不需要做太多的调整。

contents.title: 1.着装仪表在面试中起着很重要的作用。
contents.answer: Dressing and appearance play an important role in the interview.

contents.title: 2.得体的仪表会给面试官留下好的印象。
contents.answer: Decent appearance will leave the interviewer with a good impression.

contents.title: 3.对面试者来说，了解有关着装仪表的知识是十分必要的。
contents.answer: Having knowledge of dressing and appearance is quite necessary for the interview.

contents.title: 4.认为在面试中必须要穿名牌服装，这其实是误解。
contents.answer: It is a misunderstanding that you should wear clothes of name brand in the interview.

contents.title: 5.女士化淡妆或不化妆参加面试都是可以的。
contents.answer: It is appropriate for ladies to wear a little or no make-up in the interview.

contents.title: 6.面试中应当避免那些亮闪闪的衣服。
contents.answer: Shiny clothes should be avoided in the interview.

contents.title: 7.面试官并非仅仅重视着装仪表。
contents.answer: The interviewer doesn't focus on dressing and appearance alone.

contents.title: 8.得体的着装可以增加你的自信。
contents.answer: Decent dressing helps build your confi dence.

contents.title: 9.你的着装应当展现你最好的一面。
contents.answer: Your dressing should reflect the best of yourself.

contents.title: 10.我们不能一味地注重着装仪表。
contents.answer: We should not pay too much emphasis on dressing and appearance alone.

contents.hanyi: n. 外观，外貌，外表，仪表
adj. 流行的，时尚的，时髦的
